articles.author: Tracy Swartz
articles.title: This good hygiene habit could lower your risk of a stroke — but only a third of Americans do it - Yahoo Life
articles.description: About 795,000 Americans will have a stroke this year.
articles.content:
Mind your hygiene!
About 795,000 Americans will have a stroke this year, but new research suggests that a common, healthy habit may reduce the risk of certain types of stroke.
